subsection.name: Force Field X
subsection.p: Currently the Force Field X project include about 130 Java classes. An ANT build.xml file for building Force Field X is included with the distribution.
The Application Programming Interface (API) documentation on Force Field X packages is available as Javadocs.

For detailed information on the layout of Force Field X source code visit the "Project Documentation" area of this website. For example, we use the JDepend Report to avoid cyclic package dependencies.

subsection.name: Ant
subsection.p: After installing Ant, Force Field X can be built using the command 'ant' within the FFX directory. Specific instructions for building the FFX Molecular Biophysics Environment are given here.

subsection.name: Maven
subsection.p: The Force Field X web site facilitates technology transfer and further development of features. It is built with the Maven project management tool.
